Module com.example.sudokuminiproject2
Package com.example.sudokuminiproject2.model.board

Class Board

java.lang.Object
com.example.sudokuminiproject2.model.board.BoardAdapter
com.example.sudokuminiproject2.model.board.Board
All Implemented Interfaces:
IBoard
public class Board extends BoardAdapter
Represents a 6x6 Sudoku board and provides functionality to initialize and manage the board. This class generates a valid Sudoku board with randomized numbers and includes methods for checking and correcting the validity of the board.
See Also:
  • BoardAdapter

  • Constructor Details

    • Board

      public Board()
      Constructs the board and initializes it with random valid numbers. This constructor generates the board by filling each row with random numbers and then ensuring that the board is valid by calling the `correctingBoard` method.

  • Method Details

    • randomNumberGenerator

      public int randomNumberGenerator(int[] allowedNumbers)
      Generates a random number from the list of allowed numbers and removes it from the list.
      Parameters:
      allowedNumbers - the list of allowed numbers to choose from
      Returns:
      the generated random number
      See Also:
      • correctingBoard(int)

    • correctingBoard

      public void correctingBoard(int actualColumn)
      Corrects the board for the specified column by ensuring that all rows are valid based on the Sudoku rules for rows and boxes. If the numbers in the current column do not satisfy the rules, new numbers are generated until they do.
      Parameters:
      actualColumn - the column being corrected
      See Also:
      • randomNumberGenerator(int[])

    • getNumberByIndex

      public int getNumberByIndex(int column, int row)

    • getBoard

      public List<List<Integer>> getBoard()
